name: Pet Box
description: A gift box containing unknown things. Pets are very excited to see it, so you can send this box to them as a reward.

name: Pet EXP Potion (L)
description: A potion with magic power, the pet can receive 22500 points of EXP after drinking it.

name: Pet EXP Potion (M)
description: A potion with magic power, the pet can receive 7500 points of EXP after drinking it.

name: Pet EXP Potion (S)
description: A potion with magic power, the pet can receive 2500 points of EXP after drinking it.

name: Pet Food
description: A food preferred by lively pets, also edible for human. It can restore 50-90 points of HP.

name: Petite's Tail Blueprint
description: The accessory imitating Petite's Tail. Being dyed purple without reasons.

name: Ph.D Hat
description: "How time flies. The face reveals a farewell expression. But the new encounters are important, right? So just look ahead and set off lightly! March along the broad road! "

name: Phen Guitar
description: The moment you hold on to it, you will feel the power of Rock' n' Roll music. Just follow the flow and stand on the stage, you are going to be the spotlight!
effect: Max HP ＋5%,Wind, Earth, Water, Fire Dmg Taken －3%

name: Piano Shard
description: Falling from the waving wings of elemental elves, the light dust fell on the ordinary cards and then brought them strong affinity power. The power can be injected into the adventurer's soul through the power of Valkyrie, which will make adventurers preferred by elements.

name: Piece of Cake
description: An extremely delicious cake, the favorite of lively pet Little Green. It can restore 270-330 points of HP.

name: Piercing Staff [1]
description: A staff inlaid with a mysterious gem. The fluctuation of gemstones can partially invalidate the opponent's M.Def.

name: Piercing Staff [2]
description: A staff inlaid with a mysterious gem. The fluctuation of gemstones can partially invalidate the opponent's M.Def.
